title: Provided that the structures attracting the provisions of Maharashtra Slums Areas (Improvement, Clea
clause_text: Provided that the structures attracting the provisions of Maharashtra Slums Areas (Improvement, Clearance and Redevelopment) Act, 1971shall be developed under the provision of Regulation 33(10) Institutional Development/ Exhibition cum convention Center.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided that the structures attracting the provisions of Maharashtra Slums Areas (Improvement, Clearance and Redevelopment) Act, 1971shall be developed under the provision of Regulation 33(10)
